cards.title: Skitter
cards.gameplay: Damage dealt by 'the swarm' is environment damage.
powers: Either place a Bug token on {SkitterCharacter} or play a Strategy. You may move a Bug token from one of your cards to {SkitterCharacter} or one of your Strategy cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: The environment deals 1 toxic damage to a target.
Destroy a non-character target. Remove Skitter from the game.

cards.title: Unrelenting Stings
body: At the end of your turn the swarm deals up to X targets 1 toxic damage, where X = 1 + the number of Bug tokens on this card.
cards.flavorText: Just a heartbeat later, I{BR}realized my bugs had broken through.{BR}They found flesh to latch on to, flesh{BR}to bite, sting, claw and puncture

cards.title: Bug Clones
body: Whenever {SkitterCharacter} would be dealt damage you may prevent it. If you do, either remove 2 Bug tokens from this card or destroy it.
cards.flavorText: When the bugs rose, they rose{BR}in the general shape of a person,{BR}of me.

cards.title: Tracking Bugs
body: X on this card = 1 + the number of Bug tokens on this card.
At the end of your turn you may reveal the top X cards of a deck, discard up to 1 of those cards, then return the cards in any order.

flavorQuotes.text: So long as you have this,{BR}I'll know where you are,{BR}because I can keep an eye out{BR}for the fly in a box.

cards.title: Delivery Service
body: At the end of your turn choose a player. That player draws up to X cards, where X = 1 + the number of Bug tokens on this card.
cards.flavorText: I closed my hand around a pen{BR}as the cloud of airborne insects{BR}delivered it to me. They dispersed,{BR}and the pen remained behind.

cards.title: Sabotage Swarm
body: At the end of your turn you may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card. If you do, either remove 2 Bug tokens from this card or destroy it.
cards.flavorText: The outlet that fed Kid Win's{BR}anti-bug drones... I found the wiring{BR}in the walls and ordered cockroaches{BR}to start chewing through it.

cards.title: Deadly Spiders
body: X on this card = the number of Bug tokens on this card or 3, whichever is lower.
At the end of your turn the swarm deals up to 1 target X + 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She's a black widow spider.{BR}A single bite has been known{BR}to kill a full grown human,{BR}or put them into a coma.

cards.title: Regroup
body: Place a Bug token on Skitter.
You may move any number of Bug tokens from one of your cards to {SkitterCharacter} or a Strategy card, as many times as you would like.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Always Planning
body: At the start of the environment turn place a Bug token on {SkitterCharacter}.
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Strategy card. Put it into play and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.title: Storm of Stingers
body: You may move a Bug token from one of your cards to {SkitterCharacter} or a Strategy card.
Remove any number of Bug tokens from {SkitterCharacter}. {SkitterCharacter} deals up to X targets 2 melee damage and 2 toxic damage, where X = 1 + the number of tokens you removed.
cards.flavorText: Nearly seven hundred hornets exploded{BR}from underneath my panels of armor.

cards.title: Swarm of Flies
body: Reduce melee and projectile damage dealt to targets in this play area by 1.
When this card enters play place 2 Bug tokens on {SkitterCharacter}.
When this card leaves play remove 1 Bug token from a card in this play area.
cards.flavorText: I'd packed the entirety of the van,{BR}minus the driver and passenger seats,{BR}with bugs.

cards.title: Vindictive Creativity
body: Whenever the swarm deals damage to a villain target, increase that damage by 1.
Whenever the swarm deals damage, change the damage type to a type of your choice.

flavorQuotes.text: If you told me that girl was{BR}a member of the Slaughterhouse Nine,{BR}I wouldn't have batted an eyelash.

cards.title: Sweep the Area
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Discard any revealed targets and return the remaining cards in any order.{BR}{SkitterCharacter} deals 1 psychic damage to all villain targets.
cards.flavorText: My attention swept over my territory,{BR}with an emphasis on the centermost{BR}area near where I'd held my speech.

cards.title: Spidersilk Armour
body: Reduce non-fire damage that would be dealt to {SkitterCharacter} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Set her on fire.{BR}Her costume is bulletproof,{BR}and I want this done.{BR}I need to attend to other matters.

cards.title: Atlas
body: {SkitterCharacter} is immune to damage from environment cards.
At the end of your turn draw a card
cards.flavorText: Six and a half feet long,{BR}five feet across and five feet tall.{BR}A giant beetle.

cards.title: Bury in Bugs
body: You may move a Bug token from one of your cards to {SkitterCharacter} or a Strategy card.
Remove any number of Bug tokens from {SkitterCharacter}. {SkitterCharacter} destroys up to X Ongoing cards, where X = 1 + the number of tokens you removed.
cards.flavorText: Some entered the cloud,{BR}and the response was swift and brutal.{BR}{BR}The bugs consumed them.

cards.title: Improvisational Ingenuity
body: The first time each turn {SkitterCharacter} or the swarm would deal damage but that damage is prevented, you may use a power.
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put 1 into your hand and shuffle the others back into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Do [i]not[/i] use grenades.{BR}I assure you it does not work out{BR}the way you imagine it will.

cards.title: Impeccable Aim
powers: {SkitterCharacter} deals a target 2 irreducible projectile damage. {SkitterCharacter} may deal another target 1 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: Having bugs over the entire area,{BR}I had a sense of the area, of the{BR}topography, of where everything was. It{BR}wasn't perfect, but it was an advantage.
